```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(magrittr)
load('predictions.rds')

output %<>% mutate(halfl = halfl/24)

model <- lm(halfl ~ poly(releaseF, 2)*poly(sortF, 6) + sortF, output)

output <- cbind(output,
                as.data.frame(predict(model,
                                      output,
                                      interval = c("prediction"),
                                      level = 0.8)))

ggplot(output, aes(x = sortF,
                   color = as.factor(releaseF),
                   group = releaseF)) +
  geom_ribbon(aes(ymin = lwr, ymax = upr, fill = as.factor(releaseF)), linetype = "blank", alpha = 0.6) +
  theme_bw() +
  xlab("Sorting fraction") +
  ylab("log10(Half life in days)")
```
